data.title: Clifford Ray Brown Jr. Obituary 2018
data.meta_description: Clifford Ray Brown Jr., age 60, of Darlington, MD passed away on December 20, 2018 at Upper Chesapeake Medical Center in Bel Air, MD. Born in Aberdeen, MD, he was the son of Cli...
data.text:
Clifford Ray Brown Jr., age 60, of Darlington, MD passed away on December 20, 2018 at Upper Chesapeake Medical Center in Bel Air, MD. Born in Aberdeen, MD, he was the son of Clifford Ray and Fern (Smith) Brown. Clifford was an avid fisherman, hunter and crabber. He was also known for his carpentry skills.

Mr. Brown Jr. is survived by two daughters, Jessica K. Catron of Elkton and her husband, Clark and Rachel K. Scarborough of Forest Hill and her husband, Nicholas; two sons, Clifford R. Brown III of Couzmel, Mexico and Nicholas V. Brown of Port Deposit; two brothers, Kenneth G. Brown of Havre de Grace and Scott Eric Brown of Darlington; four grandsons, Logan Catron, Landon Catron, Dylan Catron, Elliott Scarborough, and a granddaughter, Harlow Scarborough.

Those who desire may make contributions to MD State Game and Fish Protective Association.
